001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CurrentEGVGuiDataRequest;
009
010/**
011 * Gets the current CGM reading
012 */
013/**
014 * Gets the current CGM reading
015 *
016
017 *
018 * <br>
019 *
020 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CurrentEGVGuiDataRequest}, opCode 35, size 8
021 *
022 * <br>
023 *
024 * 
025 * <table border='1'>
026 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
027 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>35</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
028 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>8</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
029 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
030 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CurrentEGVGuiDataRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
031 * </table>
032 */@MessageProps(
033    opCode=35,
034    size=8,
035    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
036    request=CurrentEGVGuiDataRequest.class
037)
038public class CurrentEGVGuiDataResponse extends Message {
039    
040    private long bgReadingTimestampSeconds;
041    private int cgmReading;
042    private int egvStatusId;
043    private EGVStatus egvStatus;
044    private int trendRate;
045    
046    public CurrentEGVGuiDataResponse() {}
047    
048    public CurrentEGVGuiDataResponse(long bgReadingTimestampSeconds, int cgmReading, int egvStatusId, int trendRate) {
049        this.cargo = buildCargo(bgReadingTimestampSeconds, cgmReading, egvStatusId, trendRate);
050        this.bgReadingTimestampSeconds = bgReadingTimestampSeconds;
051        this.cgmReading = cgmReading;
052        this.egvStatusId = egvStatusId;
053        this.egvStatus = getEgvStatus();
054        this.trendRate = trendRate;
055        
056    }
057
058    /**
059     * <table border="1">
060     * <caption>Parsed fields for CurrentEGVGuiDataResponse:</caption>
061     * <tr><td><code>bgReadingTimestampSeconds</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
062     * <tr><td><code>cgmReading</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 4)</code></td></tr>
063     * <tr><td><code>egvStatusId</code></td><td><code>raw[6]</code></td></tr>
064     * <tr><td><code>egvStatus</code></td><td><code>getEgvStatus()</code></td></tr>
065     * <tr><td><code>trendRate</code></td><td><code>raw[7]</code></td></tr>
066     * </table>
067     */
068    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
069        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
070        this.cargo = raw;
071        this.bgReadingTimestampSeconds = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0);
072        this.cgmReading = Bytes.readShort(raw, 4);
073        this.egvStatusId = raw[6];
074        this.egvStatus = getEgvStatus();
075        this.trendRate = raw[7];
076        
077    }
078
079    
080    /**
081     * <table border="1">
082     * <caption>Byte layout for CurrentEGVGuiDataResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
083     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
084     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>toUint32(bgReadingTimestampSeconds) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
085     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>toUint32(bgReadingTimestampSeconds) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
086     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>toUint32(bgReadingTimestampSeconds) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
087     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint32(bgReadingTimestampSeconds) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
088     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(cgmReading) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
089     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(cgmReading) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
090     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>(byte) egvStatus</code></td></tr>
091     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>(byte) trendRate</code></td></tr>
092     * </table>
093     */
094    public static byte[] buildCargo(long bgReadingTimestampSeconds, int cgmReading, int egvStatus, int trendRate) {
095        return Bytes.combine(
096            Bytes.toUint32(bgReadingTimestampSeconds), 
097            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(cgmReading), 
098            new byte[]{ (byte) egvStatus }, 
099            new byte[]{ (byte) trendRate });
100    }
101    
102    public long getBgReadingTimestampSeconds() {
103        return bgReadingTimestampSeconds;
104    }
105    public int getCgmReading() {
106        return cgmReading;
107    }
108    public EGVStatus getEgvStatus() {
109        return EGVStatus.fromId(egvStatusId);
110    }
111
112    public int getEgvStatusId() {
113        return egvStatusId;
114    }
115    public int getTrendRate() {
116        return trendRate;
117    }
118
119    public enum EGVStatus {
120        INVALID(0),
121        VALID(1),
122        LOW(2),
123        HIGH(3),
124        UNAVAILABLE(4),
125        ;
126
127        private final int id;
128        EGVStatus(int id) {
129            this.id = id;
130        }
131
132        public int id() {
133            return id;
134        }
135
136        public static EGVStatus fromId(int id) {
137            for (EGVStatus e : values()) {
138                if (e.id() == id) {
139                    return e;
140                }
141            }
142            return null;
143        }
144    }
145    
146}
